platform.icon.picker.preview=Náhľad s\: platform.icon.picker.loading=Načítava sa
rendering.macro.iconPicker.name=Icon Picker rendering.macro.iconPicker.description=Vyberte si ikonu. rendering.macro.iconPicker.parameter.id.name=Id ### Missing: rendering.macro.iconPicker.parameter.id.description=DOM id of the input field where the picker will apply to rendering.macro.iconPicker.parameter.class.name=Trieda ### Missing: rendering.macro.iconPicker.parameter.class.description=CSS class of inputs where the picker will apply to rendering.macro.iconPicker.parameter.prefix.name=Prefix ### Missing: rendering.macro.iconPicker.parameter.prefix.description=Prefix to add before the name of the icon in the input field (default: "image:icon:")
